description: Featuring fettuccine tossed with tuna flakes, fresh asparagus and lemon juice, this simple pasta recipe will become your new go-to dish.
name: Tuna & Asparagus Primavera Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 425g can tuna in oil, flaked, oil reserved
1 bunch asparagus, halved crossways and lengthways

recipeInstructions.text: Cook pasta in a large saucepan of boiling water according to packet instructions. Drain, reserving 1/3 cup cooking liquid.

Meanwhile, heat reserved oil in a large, deep frying pan over medium-high heat. Add lemon zest and asparagus and cook for 3 minutes or until asparagus is bright green and tender. Add tuna and cook for 2 minutes or until heated through.
Add pasta, lemon juice, reserved cooking liquid and half the parmesan. Cook, tossing, for 2 minutes or until heated through. Divide among bowls. Top with remaining parmesan and season with pepper.
